videos.title: The #1 Mistake New Creators Make (And The Fix)

insight.whatWorked: Strong promise + specific outcome in title
stealThis: Lead with the problem, not the solution
hookIdea: Start with a relatable failure story
Promise the specific fix within the first 10 seconds

videos.title: I Tried the Viral Algorithm Hack for 30 Days

insight.whatWorked: Experiment format + time constraint creates curiosity
hookIdea: Mention the exact number of views/subs gained

videos.title: How to Edit Videos 10x Faster (My Exact Workflow)

stealThis: Use specific numbers instead of vague claims
Add 'My Exact' or 'Step by Step' for authority
hookIdea: Demo the workflow speed in first 15 seconds
Mention the time you'll save them

videos.title: Why I Quit My 9-5 to Become a Full-Time Creator

insight.whatWorked: Personal story + relatable dream resonates emotionally
stealThis: Share vulnerable moments to build connection
Tie personal story to viewer's aspirations
hookIdea: Start with the moment of decision

videos.title: The Tools I Use to Run My YouTube Business

insight.whatWorked: 'Tools I Use' + 'business' frames channel as professional
stealThis: Position yourself as running a business, not just a hobby
hookIdea: Tease the most unusual/unexpected tool first
Mention how much these tools make/save you

analysisJson.summary: Your top converting videos share a common pattern: specific outcomes + personal authority. Videos with numbers in titles (10x, #1, 30 days) consistently outperform vague promises.
hookPatterns: Lead with relatable failure or pain point
Show quick proof/results in first 10 seconds
Make a specific promise with timeline
recommendations: Always include specific numbers in titles
Lead hooks with the problem, not the solution

patternAnalysis.analysisMarkdownFallback:
## Pattern Analysis

### What's Working
Your top converting videos share specific outcomes + personal authority.

### Title Formulas
- The #1 [Problem] [Audience] Make
- I Tried [Thing] for [Time]

### Recommendations
1. Double down on experiment formats
2. Use specific numbers
3. Lead with problems
